name: SBK Generations
summary:
The official game of the Superbike FIM World Championship is back this year on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 with the most comprehensive motorcycling simulation of all time.

Experience the last 4 seasons, including the new 2012 season, of the SBK world championship. Take the title of World Champion, take on the new SBK Experience mode and win the all-new single-maker races. With SBK Generations, Milestone is ready to release the definitive masterpiece of the motorcycling genre!

OFFICIAL MODE: experience the thrills of the official Superbike championship! Race as the SBK, SuperSport and SuperStock 1000 riders on the most famous circuits in the world, and relive the history-making races of the 2009 to 2012 seasons.
CARRIER MODE: take on the championships from 2009 to 2012 as your alter-ego, starting in the lower categories and going all the way to the premium class, where the World Champion title awaits.

SBK EXPERIENCE: a unique and innovative experience that brings you into the heart of the world of motorcycling through thrilling themed challenges and single-maker races, against the best riders in the world, including the Legends.

ONLINE: experience all the thrills of a real Superbike race, challenging up to 15 players online.
